text: Aruna Balraj is an Indian film actress in the Kannada film industry. Some of the films of Aruna Balraj as an actress include Naayi Neralu (2006), Ambari (2009) , Raja Huli (2013) and Gubbi Mele Bramhastra (2019) ==Awards== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! Award ! Film ! Credit ! Category ! Result |- | style="text-align:left;"| 2017 | style="text-align:left;"| Filmfare Awards South | style="text-align:left;"| Operation Alamelamma | style="text- align:left;"| Actress | style="text-align:left;"| Best Supporting Actress | |} ==Career== Aruna Balraj has been a part of more than 50 films in Kannada. ==Selected filmography== * Sinnga (2019) * Vaasu Naan Pakka Commercial (2018) * Ayogya (2018) * Gaja (2008) ==See also== *List of people from Karnataka *Cinema of Karnataka *List of Indian film actresses *Cinema of India ==External links== * ==References== Category:Actresses in Kannada cinema Category:Living people Category:Kannada people Category:Actresses from Karnataka Category:Indian film actresses Category:21st-century Indian actresses Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Aruna Balraj
